About Me

Hi, my name is George and I am an IT professional. As well as providing L1 phone and email support, I also have experience making software. I have worked on numerous solo projects, as well as projects within a team.

I am most skilled in: Python and Git

Projects

Basic Calculator

github.com/GeorgeCiesinski

This is an app created using Python and Kivy. It is capable of carrying out basic arithmetic and can run on most platforms, including Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android.

I started this project as a way of learning Python and Kivy. I learned many skills with this project, and developed an appreciation for Kivy as an NUI framework.

Experience

Pinnaca

https://www.pinnaca.com/

CSC Advocate

April 2017 - Present

Pinnaca provides Video Conferencing and Unified Communications support to customers worldwide. Since the earliest days of video conferencing, Pinnaca has focused on the customer's needs, delivering best-in-class video collaboration solutions, support and consultations.

As a CSC Advocate, I provide L1 support to customers using various services.

  • Launch video teleconferences over a complex global service network
  • Provide live assistance for ongoing conferences
  • Carry out test calls with clients around the globe to identify issues and collect relevant logs
  • Investigate issues over the phone and email

Education

Humber College

Electromechanical Engineering - Robotics and Automation

2011 - 2014

The Humber Institute of Technology and Advanced Learning, commonly known as Humber College, was founded in 1967. Humber is a publicly funded college in Toronto, Ontario, Canada.

During my time at Humber College, I acquired many new skills which prepared me for the workforce. My studies focused both on the design and building of automation lines, as well as many different types of programming. My classes prepared me for:

  • Programming various kinds of PLCs and Articulated Robots
  • Networking PLCs
  • Developing software to integrate with PLCs using HMI and C#
